name: Couscous
description: Pierre Franey brought this easy couscous recipe to The Times back in 1985. “Cooks need only combine the couscous with a broth or water, bring it to a boil and let it stand five minutes,” he wrote. His version, ready in minutes on a harried weeknight, adds a bit of butter and is a perfect pairing for merguez sausages.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups fresh or canned chicken broth

recipeInstructions.text: Put broth, butter and salt in a saucepan. Bring to the boil.
Add the couscous and stir. Cover and remove from the heat. Let stand 5 minutes.
Fluff the couscous with a fork and serve hot with merguez sausage.
